head.supplied: ¶ Dr Ferdinand Mueller, Government Botanist, Melbourne, Victoria, a gentleman highly distinguished as a Traveller & Botanist, late Botanist to the Australian Exploring Expedition under Mr Gregory, & ...

div.p: From William Hooker and others to the Linnean Society of London
Linnean Society, London, Certificates of Fellows, Foreign Members, and Associates

Dr Ferdinand Mueller, Government Botanist, Melbourne, Victoria, a gentleman highly distinguished as a Traveller & Botanist, late Botanist to the Australian Exploring Expedition under Mr Gregory, & the author of numerous valuable papers on Australian Botany, being desirous of becoming a Fellow of the Linnean Society, we the undersigned do, of our knowledge of him or of his writing,
of our ... writing interlined.
recommend him as being eminently deserving of that honor.

div.p:
Charles Darwin
Annotated: Proposed
Nov 4th 1858 | Ballot
Jany 20th 1859. Elected. J.J. Bt. [i.e. J. J. Bennett, Secretary].
'.
